derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: modern Latin, earlier molybdena (originally denoting a salt of lead), from Greek molubdaina 'plummet', from molubdos 'lead'

means.word_mean: 1. a polyvalent metallic element that resembles chromium and tungsten in its properties; used to strengthen and harden steel
